ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Minister of PSPC to Transfer, Lease or Loan Essential Goods in respond Ã  la COVID-19
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Public Services and Procurement Canada to transfer, lease or loan, to any government, body or person in Canada or elsewhere, any public property, including, but not limited to, personal protective equipment, food, medication, chemicals, ventilators, hospital beds, temporary shelters, and emergency mobile hospitals necessary to respond to the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
AttachmentsAttachment
